mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (username, password, name, phone, email) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, name, phone, email from user
